column4: hello , i cant connect to the router ...any advice ?normaly in windows i type in browser http://fritz.box but ubuntu does not recognize the router
hello , i cant connect to the router ...any advice ?normaly in windows i type in browser http://fritz.box but ubuntu does not recognize the router
can you ping that name? if you run: route    you will see the routers internal IP. Can you ping that?
ping it in a terminal, does it reply?
